name: Roc
description: RoAc is based on third-generation blockchain technology and takes practical scenarios for secure applications as the starting point. While ensuring the existing security advantages of blockchain technology, it transforms traditional network boundary protection into a new security protection mode involving all network nodes. Through a distributed node consensus mechanism, it resists attacks from malicious nodes and deeply integrates the four dimensions of technology, finance, application, and operation and maintenance, Build a comprehensive blockchain system security and value symbiosis system.
